attributes.action: give a police escort to the cortege of ALL returning soldiers killed in action
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Country needs to recognise how brave these soldiers have been to give their lives for our safety despite where they serve and we need to bring back respect for those that have lost their lives. What better way to start than stopping and showing our respect to our heroes because that is what they are.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
